title: Chicken Lombardy
steps: Melt 2 tbsp butter in skillet. Cook mushrooms until browned. Remove and set aside.
Butterfly chicken breasts and pound to ¼-inch thickness. Dredge in flour.
Brown chicken in batches using remaining butter (1 tbsp per batch).
Preheat oven to 450°F. Arrange chicken in greased 13x9 baking dish.
Deglaze skillet with marsala wine, chicken stock, salt and pepper. Simmer 10 minutes.
Pour sauce over chicken and mushrooms.
Combine cheeses and green onions. Sprinkle over chicken.
Bake 15-20 minutes until cheese melts and browns slightly.
